marklogic.body: think this is just a normal transaction, and, behold, in April this year, the the Beibei start a prairie fire of the police station to find Chen, said he purchased this car white Accord is a stolen car, because this car stolen cars, and also pull a car thief. So Chen with the police found the car under the house, on June 22 this year, Chen on suspicion of concealing proceeds of crime,Abercrombie, police station, detained by a prairie fire. the The third , around 10 o\'clock on the evening of 9 December 2008, Zhongmou again in the same way,nike football, will be parked in the the Yubei turquoise North Road East and the spring Bazi white Accord cars to steal. Zhongmou first sold to the price of 4800 yuan Xu, Xu then will be the vehicle through the network of 7000 yuan sold to used car Chen, Chen ultimately sold to the price of 10,000 yuan Zhou. like cars see itchy It is reported that, at present, three stolen vehicles have been recovered by the public security organs, and has all the hair back to the owner. , the evening of 19 September 2008 10:00, the Zhongmou came under the Yuzhong Danyang Mingju B building, found a black Accord sedan downstairs Zhongmou the same the way of the black car stolen. Subsequently, the Zhongmou to sell price of 15,Abercrombie Femme,000 yuan to Mr. Kwak. the car has been scrapped, do not have to get a license. Chen worried about the car robbery car, did not dare to start to buy, can be heard a friend of Chen, but fancy this car, plus car dealers repeated assurances that this car is not a robbery car, so, Chen, and became the middleman, the price of 7000 yuan to buy a car Accord sedan. online to buy a car pull thieves Chen is the Nanping used car market business households, on February 14 this year, he saw a second-hand vehicle information, the information is called Chen, a good deal, so about Xu out to look at cars. the first time,longchamp pas cher, in July 2008, 10 pm, the man Zhongmou came to the side of the,mercurial vapor superfly, Ssangyong West 108 2-2 ​​downstairs road, Yubei District. Roadside stop a gray Honda Accord, see around no one the Zhongmou come up with a screwdriver pry open the door, car keys poke the ignition switch, gray Accord sedan successfully stolen. In November the same year, Zhongmou through network and Pengmou of contact on the gray Accord sedans sold to Pengmou price of 5500 yuan. second year stole three Accord people wondering, what is the motive of the thief Zhongmou car theft? the original, including Chen purchased this car white Accord, this case involves three stolen Accord, are a man named Zhongmou for. According to the Public Prosecution Beibei District People\'s Procuratorate, Zhongmou stole three cars,lunettes soleil ray Ban, and all Accord sedans. Beibei District People\'s Court for trial, the Zhongmou tell the whole story. Zhongmou is deputy director of the Chongqing bank credit,Ralph Lauren, a monthly salary of thousands of car theft is not sold for money, but because he is like the Accord, he saw on the itchy. Zhongmou said, because he liked, he opened the Accord sedan, its can be described as a soft Spot. 相关的主题文章： abercrombie and fitch The man is suspected to hit 20 cars the police fired 16 gu longchamp soldes Women spend 400 million to buy Tibetan mastiff by air 30 Merced longchamp pas cher Man on the family status quo dissatisfaction with robbery and
